纼字的基本解释

纼
（紖）
zhèn
穿在牛鼻子上的备牵引的绳子。
牵引灵车的大绳子。

纼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhèn］
［《廣韻》直引切，上軫，澄。］
亦作“絼1”。“纼1”的繁体字。
(1)牛鼻绳。后亦泛指牵引牲口的绳索。
(2)引申为牵引柩车的绳索。

纼
Basic explanation of words
纼
(紖)
zhèn
A traction rope worn on the nose of a cow.
The big rope pulling the hearse.
纼
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhèn］
["Guangyun" straight lead and cut, Shang Zhen, Cheng. ]
Also known as "絼1". Traditional characters for "纼1".
(1) Bull nose rope. Later, it also refers to the ropes used to haul animals.
(2) The extension is the rope to tow the hearse.
